text:
Here is what I am able to gather so far.

There are some requirements for purchasing a short code number like 444 and connection setup. Because this project is time sensitive and a non-profit initiative, the requirements can potentially be road blocks. He spoke with official from Sales and to ease the requirements, he has suggested that we get someone from MoH or EPHI own the work and send letter to ET Sales.

For implementation details, Yohannes can be contacted at <tel:+251911208274|+251911208274>.

text: <@U01077KJKQU> <@U01077KJKQU> Yes, very helpfull! Thanks.  So Ethio Telecom can provide SIP connection but he mentioned it would be complicate things if it is hosted outside. So the better route seems to be getting  a virtual machine at Ethio Telecom and a SIP connection.  But what ever routes we  move the first step is for MOH to send a letter to Ethio Telecom officials requesting this.

elements.text: Yes, very helpfull! Thanks.  So Ethio Telecom can provide SIP connection but he mentioned it would be complicate things if it is hosted outside. So the better route seems to be getting  a virtual machine at Ethio Telecom and a SIP connection.  But what ever routes we  move the first step is for MOH to send a letter to Ethio Telecom officials requesting this.
